      • vboID

        public int vboID()
        Gets or sets a vertex buffer object (VBO) ID for this polygon. If the polygon's ID is undefined before calling this method, a new ID will be issued. Calling this method subsequently returns the same ID of the polygon as originally set.
        Returns:
        The ID of this polygon.
